|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9344; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 560<!-- 560 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Qualcomm Atheros;; |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = 9-24 |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/22/2014 |estreldate = 2013 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] AR9344 MIPS 74Kc 560MHz CPU *128MB System Memory *16MB NOR Flash *On-board 2.4GHz max 23dBm output power (per chain) *802.11n compliant & backward compatible with 802.11b/g *2x2 On-board radio up to 300Mbps physical data rate *1x Mini PCI Express Slot at 9.2mm height *2x Gigabit LAN RJ45 with Auto-MDI/X *Passive 24V Power Over Ethernet
===Applications=== *Optimized for 802.11ac Module Support *802.11b/g/n Access Point *Point-to-Point High Capacity Wireless Bridge *Point-to-Multipoint High Capacity Wireless Bridge *Wireless Base Station *Wireless Customer-Premises Equipment (CPE)
===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/wpj344hv.html Compex System Sample Store]
===Others=== '''Compex''' is marketing this device as an ''802.11ac ready'' device - it is designed to be accompanied with a large form-factor Mini PCIe 11ac radio (like the [[Compex WLE900N5|WLE900N5]] or [[Compex WLE900N5-23|WLE900N5-23]]), though [http://en.techinfodepot.shoutwiki.com/w/index.php?title=Special%3AAsk&q=%5B%5BBrand%3A%3ACompex%5D%5D+%5B%5BModel%3A%3A~*WLE*%5D%5D&po=%3FInterface%0D%0A%3FFCC+ID%0D%0A%3FManuf%0D%0A%3FOEM+model%0D%0A%3FVendor+ID%0D%0A%3FDevice+ID%0D%0A%3FSubvendor+ID%0D%0A%3FSubdevice+ID%0D%0A%3FChip1+model%0D%0A%3FChip2+model%0D%0A%3FSupported+802dot11+protocols%3DPHY+modes%0D%0A%3FMIMO+status%0D%0A%3FOUI%0D%0A%3FEstimated+year+of+release%3DEst.+year%0D%0A&eq=yes&p%5Bformat%5D=broadtable&sort_num=&order_num=ASC&p%5Blimit%5D=500&p%5Boffset%5D=&p%5Blink%5D=all&p%5Bsort%5D=&p%5Bheaders%5D=show&p%5Bmainlabel%5D=&p%5Bintro%5D=&p%5Boutro%5D=&p%5Bsearchlabel%5D=%E2%80%A6+further+results&p%5Bdefault%5D=&p%5Bclass%5D=sortable+wikitable+smwtable&eq=yes all '''WLE''' series radios] are [https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=467553173325542&l=967b6a1662 noted as being supported].
The datasheet provided by '''Compex''' states there are two item codes for the board... *[[Compex WPJ344LV 6A03PC8128BR|WPJ344LV 6A03PC8128BR]] - '''LV''' (low-voltage - 24 VDC) variant **9 to 24 VDC via DC jack, 12 to 24 VDC through PoE *[[Compex WPJ344HV 6A03PC8128BR|WPJ344HV 6A03PC8128BR]] - '''HV''' (high-voltage - 48 VDC) variant **24 to 48 VDC via DC jack, 24 to 48 VDC through PoE Additional information, per the datasheet, follows... *"C-344JPW 6A02" is appears to be silkscreened on the board. *Power consumption (board only): 5 W *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::117 mm x 105 mm x 17 mm]] *RoHS compliant *A USB extension board (w/ 2x Female A and 1x USB-only Mini PCIe) is (optionally) available
"C-344JPW 6A01" is silkscreened on the board pictured in the prelimary datasheet.
==Links of Interest== [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/compex/wpj344 On the '''OpenWrt Wiki''']
